name: Exodus Beauty
review:
**This platform has been incredibly frustrating.**

I connected the TikTok app to my Shopify store—which was already performing well—because I wanted to increase product visibility and direct customers to my Shopify store from TikTok (similar to FB&IG). I assumed that orders placed through TikTok would be managed via Shopify, but I was very wrong.

TikTok prioritises customer engagement on its app, which means it applies discounts and free shipping to sellers’ listings without giving sellers the option to opt in or out. After receiving two orders where customers were granted free shipping—despite my shipping profiles being correctly set up—I had no choice but to cancel the orders, as they were placed without any shipping fees being paid. The seller also bears the cost of free shipping, and deductions are made from your payout in 5 BUSINESS DAYS.

I initially thought the shipping setup was incorrect, so I contacted support. Upon further investigation, I discovered that TikTok had automatically listed all my products at 40% off, with free shipping on orders over £22. None of these settings were configured on my end. I strongly believe that sellers should have full control over what discounts and offers are applied to their products/services.

Additionally, having shipping managed through TikTok’s platform added unnecessary steps to my existing Shopify fulfilment process, complicating operations that were already running smoothly.

These are my personal views, but ultimately, I chose to deactivate my TikTok store. Based on this experience, I don’t believe selling on the platform is currently viable or profitable for my business—either now or in the long term.

name: T-Shirt Crazed
review:
Shop was suspended due to Identity Re-Verification. Provided identifying information with images and videos as requested for shop and was approved then within 24 hours shop was suspended again for same reason.

Completed appeal process again with the requested 2 forms of government-issued photo ID: License and Passport; Corporate documentation: copy of business registration and business tax return Evidence of alternative sales channels: business website; Physical warehouse location and supporting documentation: ownership documents or leasing contracts, waybill showing delivery of inventory to warehouse, utility bills, video footage at warehouse location with packaging process; Picture of you holding your ID; Supporting videos and system still states information is not enough.

Well I am not sure who is reviewing the information, but training is needed for those reviewing appeal if the information provided does not prove I am a real person.

name: Remnants by Peo Vee
review:
This experience has been awful. The app made changes to my account without warning me (including a name change), it also doesn't let you sell used items which wasn't clear up front after making said changes. Umm, so only massed produced imported crap then?

The setup has been unnecessarily complex. Not hard. Just a lot of unnecessary steps. Let's you have little to no control over your policies like returns.

name: Heartmade Woodworking
review:
Everything about the Tiktok shop, seller center and product synchronization overall is an absolute disaster. Atrocious user experience, totally convoluted...literally everything and constant errors/crashes.

I have to practice deep breathing exercises for 30 minutes before I try and do anything Tiktok shop related. It never works and I still end up infuriated at how terrible the entire experience is.

Just gross.

name: Soap Is a Lye SJ LLC
review: They refuse to pay me because i use shopify for shipping instead of tiktok for shipping. They want me to purchase another shipping label and have that tracking information show as delivered in order for them to pay out my order. I will be removing everything from tiktok as its been hours of me trying to resolve this and clearly they do not care.

name: RETTRO
review: Tiktok suspended and deactivated my Tiktok SHOP before i could even get started. I have had zero violations.

name: Kingdom Brews
review: To get qualified I submitted my EIN several times and they could not get it working. The upload takes .pdf, .png, .jpg, and .jpeg and none of the formats would take it. In fact, their support team suggested all of the formats which I tried, but they said it needed to be unaltered. Um...its from the IRS in original format. Then ironically they said submit a printed file. Trash.

name: Colourpops
review:
EVERYTHING is SOOOOOoooooooo complicated!!!! nothing is easy, can't find anything you need. Nothing gives easy instructions.

I am a new tiktok seller and nothing is easy. I get violations for "diverting traffic" but I don't divert traffic as I want all my sales through tiktok shop. When I submit evidence and report back with documents - its rejected!!

I am trying so hard with this but nothing is easy what so ever. I rad the pages and pages and pages and pages of documents you have and there are thousands - nothing makes sense and its all so complicated!

I just wanted to set up a tktok shop but there are so many apps Tiktok Tiktok seller centre Tiktok business Tiktok ad manager and so on........................... pleae simplify it!!!

name: SERGE BLANCO
review: Nul, impossible d'ouvrir le compte alors que tous les documents sont en règles

name: Capobianchi
review: Pessimo! Dopo aver configurato tutto, l'app mi da alcuni prodotti sincronizzati e la possibilità di fare le campagne, entro nel seller e non c'è un prodotto sincronizzato! Bisogna fare un modulo di categoria dove si potrebbero raggruppare più prodotti, ma non è possibile in quanto tra i campi obbligatori chiede le misure!!!! Abbiamo oltre 4000 prodotti e ognuno ha una misura diversa....Chiede il certificato per vendere in UK quando il negozio è abilitato a vendere solo in Italia.....se avete grandi negozi sappiate che dovrete perdere tempo per ogni prodotto ad inserire ogni dettaglio. Pessimo!

name: Clickworthy Finds
review: I keep trying to add my Shopify account, and it keeps telling me that I have already bound another account. I have tried to contact support and have yet to get any help to fix this issue.

name: Climax Jeans
review: I have been trying for months to connect my tik tok shop but it never works. I always have to delete it all and start from the begining because I can never reach the next step. Now its asking for confimation with a code with your number but i never receive a code. I can never contibue to the next step

name: Rebel Girl Rampage
review: What a nightmare. Don’t. Just Don’t.

name: T-shirt Me Please
review: App barely works...its very frustrating

name: HUB Footwear
review: App connect niet met TikTok, blijft voor eeuwig laden. Als je een supportvraag wilt indienen geeft hij weer een foutmelding.

name: Indosole Indonesia
review: Customer support doesn't wotk at all

name: Okoboji Soap Company
review: What a NIGHTMARE!!!

name: Avoir Couture
review: I don't like this I'm getting charged for a promotion I know nothing about

name: NuevArt
review: TikTok app will not sync my products, their FAQ says to contact TikTok support if sync fails, TikTok support is completely useless and sends me on a "contact us" loop for over 2 weeks and achieves nothing.

name: Tienda Vicortech
review: The app currently shows as incompatible in markets where TikTok Ads is already officially available—for example, Costa Rica. While we can run ads here, the Shopify app remains unavailable. Access to this integration is critical for our website and campaigns to perform properly. We are actively investing in TikTok, and this limitation results in inefficient spend. We kindly request that you enable the app in Costa Rica.

name: Liberty and Victory Co LLC
review: Complete waste of time, can no human QAQC the BS coding and integration

name: Instant Hydration
review: Terrible platform. Very difficult to use.

name: SL PARIS
review: leur service client est incompétent il bloque notre compte et notre argent sans raisons ! fuyez!

name: Uniquely Thai Lao TV
review: No support unable to set up business account.

name: Surfstr
review: Crap! Full of bugs!

name: The Best Numbing Cream
review: I wish there was a setting to turn off importing orders. I enjoy having the two connected but i do not want to import the orders. Seems like a simple fix since you can turn off and on the sync for other things like product info, inventory, price. Let us connect but not sync orders

name: Nyc Neev
review:
I'm suggesting all small-scale business and seller, do-not work with TikTok seller. Reason: No seller support; very- sensitive for buyer, huge loss making opportunity and you will ended up with frustration and loss.

I'm a Marketing professional working for past 10 years with Marketplaces and can tell you TikTok Selling has worst-echo system ever for Seller.

name: Damned Threads
review: the most difficult and nonsensical selling platform / app ive ever dealt with. dont recomend

name: MARISOLTREND
review: I've been trying to sync my products for days, and it simply won't sync at all. It won't even load my catalog, so I can't do anything. It just shows me the error code "Request failed with status code 504," but I've checked my connection, cleared caches, tried from other devices and networks... and it still doesn't work. The worst part is that they don't offer any solutions.

name: Deadstock
review: I am a reseller following all their guidelines and still none of my products pass their "review"

name: The Haunted Game Cafe
review: This app is able to import and sync available inventory. However it does a poor job of importing product details. If you have more than a handful of products it is a nightmare to fix all the errors. 1. It ignores the channel setting in Shopify. Unchecking the TikTok channel in Shopify will not remove the product from the TikTok shop 2. TikTok uses both a Brand field and a Manufacturer field. Both of which ignore the Vendor setting in Shopify. 3. There are a large number of required fields in the TikTok shop that are not in Shopify, so you have to set all of them manually. There is a template, but it only works for a single Brand. There is no way to bulk edit a single field. 4. The product categories do not use the Amazon or Google system which leads to some bizarre classifications. For example, Art Supplies are listed under Computer & Office Equipment.

name: VVSdrop
review: terrible

name: Jewelry And Perfumes
review:
You work long and hard to establish a presence, and as soon as you start to earn some orders they will give you meaningless violations and hold your funds for 365 days!

All my orders have been shipped and delivered without a single issue. Now after months of selling, they ask for intrusive personal information even when they have already verified the business and have all the business certifications and tax documents. If there was ever an issue, why would you let me start to sell in the first place?

They have ZERO customer service and support. I will close the TikTok Shop and uninstall the app.

name: SIMPLES LENTE
review: Extremely frustrating experience with this App. My TikTok ads account gets suspended just minutes after launching any campaign, without any clear reason or meaningful explanation. Their support is essentially non-existent, consisting only of automated bot responses that don’t address the issue. I run the exact same Shopify store and product catalog on Google Ads, Meta, and Pinterest without any problems or policy violations. TikTok is the only platform where this has happened, and unfortunately, there’s no real path to resolution.

name: JOSSPURE |Shea Butter Soap & Natural Body Care
review: Worse customer service ever. An amoeba can give better customer service than this guys.

name: Pleasure & Intimacy
review: It was a terrible experience. I never got the issue to set up Tiktok on my store resolved. I would not recommend using Tiktok.

name: Wort & Segen
review:
A TOTAL PAIN IN THE BUTT!!! After it took AGES to register as a seller on Tiktok, I wanted to synchronize my products between Shopify an TikTok, but as I try to synchronize the window stays in boot mode (the booting circle symbol turn endless) and whether I refreshed the Browsers, cleared the Cache or switched Browsers (Firefox & Chrome), I contacted the support, but they couldn't help either. In total the plugin is a fail, but instantly after installation it expects you to rate this $h1t with 5 stars.

Although, other sellers somehow must have managed to synchronize their products... I guess.

name: G&D Creations
review: I have been going back and forth with support over issues with a error message whenever I try to manage anything on the site. Absolutely ZERO help has been given to correct this issue. Its beyond frustrating especially when it took me forever to be approved for a tiktok shop. They need to do better. Very unsatisfied.

name: Forme
review: Zero customer support. They have a chat box that remains unanswered. Their shop mangement page has an error. It shows to refresh or content customer support. Customer support does not respond. Tiktok orders transfer into Shopify with astericks so we cannot see the full address.

name: satsavonne
review: impossible de connecter mon compte tik tok sur mon site toujours des probleme rien ne fonctionne j'etais venu il y a quelque mois et pareil je ne prouverais pas mettre mes produit enfin je vais pas perdre mon temps avec votre site qui ne fonctionne pas

name: VERUCASTYLE BOUTIQUE
review: There is practically no assistance with this app as it is not allowing me to connect to my TikTok shop, and the connectivity errors are just too great.

name: Back Down South Clothing
review: I would not recommend any company to use this app. We processed hundreds of orders and tiktok cancelled and refunded orders AFTER shipping labels were created and shipped. So customers received product for free at that point. We were completely unaware this was happening because shopify doesn't notify you that tiktok cancelled the order. We are devastated that Shopify is allowing this app to even be used in their system. Shopify claims its not their issue. Tiktok doesn't even offer a callback option, only AI generated responses. We are a multimillion company that trusted this app to integrate seamlessly within shopify. There is zero excuse for them to not have to notify you within the shopify platform of any changes or discrepancies about an order. On top of that the amount of fees tiktok charges and the amount of discounts and free shipping they offer customers just doesn't make sense. DO NOT USE THIS APP. YOU WILL RECEIVE ORDERS, BUT IT WILL NOT TRANSLATE TO INCOME.

name: SupplyMaid
review: I hate this app so much. There are errors and errors all the time. I've never used a platform that throws more errors, at absolutely everything, than this garbage app. Things never sync correctly. It's just awful to use.

name: Lunautics
review: Does not allow relinking of products and we cannot link our Tiktok products to their correct Shopify products. We have reached out to Tiktok many times regarding this problem and no one can help remove them. Only orders with linked products seem to show in our Shopify orders so we still have to constantly check Tiktok shop for new orders. Have tried deleting the app and reinstalling as well with no luck. Inventory does not sync correctly and app constantly asks you to map products that you cannot map because there is no way to unlink a previous product even if it was linked to an incorrect listing. Show old orders saying they require attention even though they have already been shipped.

name: EmpyreanDeals
review: It seems easy to set up, but I can't even get past the login when linking TikTok with Shopify. Thinking I might have done something wrong, I tried logging into the TikTok app itself and was successful. For some reason, I'm unable to log in through Shopify. My passwords are correct, so the issue isn't on my end.

name: Flyclothing LLC
review: We've been in business for over 22 years and probably have about 20 apps in our Shopify store. We advertise on every medium possible. We've never experienced so much difficulty or lack of support as we have with this application and regardless of what information we supply to their "support" team, we get no resolve. They want social security numbers, Tax IDs, all locations, all application information, etc. I just counted over 200 emails to support requesting assistance and support continues to provide circular and repetitive unhelpful responses.

name: Lollygag.co
review: Products not syncing to Tiktok seller, we reinstalls their app 3 times. Endless talks to their TikTok support didn't help, I'm starting to think that TikTok are using bots for support

name: The Toucan Cove
review:
This is one of the worst channel apps on the site. The API is terrible and does not understand your product data, and it will use its terrible AI to guess what products are based on titles and descriptions, which is often completely useless.

The app itself is a laggy, buggy mess, and manually editing dozens or even hundreds of products is a nightmare. Way, way too many fields are "mandatory" that are completely irrelevant to the actual product being listed.

Unless you already have a customer based on TikTok, you should seriously consider whether this is worth your time. It wasn't worth mine.

name: Furious Sauces
review: This app is horrible. It loads painfully slow. Inventory doesn't sync, product syncing is just a mess in general. Terribly designed.

name: Zenoza
review: marche pas!!!! on m'affiche un message d'erreure suite a la valeur de mon evenement mais je ne peut pas y acceder

name: Eternal Elegance
review: A pointless app. TikTok will not import the order name or address into Shopify. The only way you can ship an order it to use their own seller center, and you still cannot obtain the order information UNTIL you ship it. Tiktok is trying to monopolize using their own shipping services if you sell on Tiktok. You cannot use any other form of shipping. DELETING.

name: Love Marlow
review: I was invited to create a shop through Shopify. I was so excited to open this new sales channel, but I soon became so disappointed. I connected everything through my Shopify account but didn't realize that TikTok required additional information, even though Shopify already had ALL that information. They permanently closed my account. After trying to chat for help to see if anything could change this, I was told there wasn't a solution. Not something any business owner likes to hear. Now, the only way I can activate a new one is to create a new email and phone number. This makes it easier to create fraudulent accounts. No wonder so many consumers say they buy things and end up getting knockoffs on TikTok. I would never buy anything. I will not set up an account until they let sellers reopen accounts.

name: Whimsy Girly Shop
review: I am having a lot of product sync issues and cannot get support from tiktok. When listing new products on shopify they will not compile to the sync list and there is no sync new products tab like there is in the help videos.

name: Nezbz.Shop
review: This TikTok app is not user-friendly. Please remove from my account immediately.

name: Kyrel
review: nul

name: Silver Moon Bay
review:
App is giving mixed messages and results ....

I keep receiving emails telling me that my shop has been approved to sell apparel and I need to download the tik tok app in my shopify store to upload my catalog.

I tried to do so in order to upload my catalog and received the message that my application was actually rejected

but yet I was approved to purchase $70 a day advertising ( in a rejected shop) ?!?!?!

Also, how do you reject a shop that has been in business over 20 years with my business license, EIN number and reseller certification all submitted ?!?!

Very confusing and frustrating !!

name: TwistLock Beverage Locking System
review:
My variants will not map correctly. Anytime I manually map, if any updates happen to the product, it will create an orphan product and break the mapping.

I have tried working with their support and had it escalated only for the ticket to be closed without any help. When I opened another help ticket, it was immediately closed again.

name: Soul Flow Apparel
review: I work in I.T. full time and I can't figure out this stupid app. First once I connected my Shopify to Tiktok it started trying to sync my whole product list. I had no say what so ever. So of course you start getting sync errors when it's trying to add over 1000 items at once without you even setting anything up. So after handling that I created a template to test out. Created it and then its not even an option when trying to sync a product. I can see them in templates setting, but nothing shows up when editing the products. Now I can't even add a product without receiving some type of error, and no customer service whatsoever.

name: Zachoo
review:
Extremely poor platform for professional use—at least in Belgium. Content gets arbitrarily blocked without explanation, severely undermining any serious content strategy. Support is virtually nonexistent; when they do respond, the answers are vague and unhelpful. A deeply frustrating experience from start to finish.

If you rely on digital tools for serious outreach, you're better off investing time and energy into Instagram or other more reliable platforms.

name: Ranok Inc
review: A complete disaster—after connecting a shop, it can’t be disconnected, and there’s constantly an “rpc call error]}” message. Support can’t do anything other than suggest using incognito mode. My God, what a nightmare in the 21st century.

name: North Biomedical
review: We’ve had a terrible experience with this app. After identifying a major bug, documenting it in a video, and submitting countless support tickets to TikTok, we continue to receive copy-paste messages as if the issue were our fault for not knowing how to configure the app. We generate six figures in sales on TikTok Shop, and it’s unbelievable how we’ve been ignored and disregarded. This is no way to treat sellers.

name: Viridian Dice
review:
Given how anyone I talk to about this app agrees that its an absolute nightmare, Im *shocked* that this app somehow has one of the highest ratings (4.8) on the shopify app platform. Just. HOW. We've had *SOOOOOO* many problems. I do not understand.

UPDATE: Finally, somehow, got it stop rejecting our documents. Running a shop has been a nightmare as well, with random AI false flagging out items as prohibited (they definitely are not) and then tickets/a support system that ranges from computer-generated worthless and agents that lack the english/cultural understanding to understand how they have errored. Maybe 1 in 10 agents understands and attempts to fix things, but that fix is usually to escalate to a different team which will also error and then put us back to step 1. I might give it 2 star because at least we're making sales, but honestly, this app has wasted so much of my time and patience that i question whether the money we've made is even worth the hassle.

Well, its been rejecting my ID verification saying my unaltered CC statements and bank statements are "Altered" again and again. They are downloaded straight from my bank (a major US bank)... So... Not sure whats up. Ive looked them over, they look fine. Ive tried 10+ times with different unaltered documents, doesnt matter. Sometimes it just rejects it saying they cant verify with no mention of altering.

We've never had this issue with any other shops/platform.

Not sure if this is some system/ai/computer error or some kind of incompetence on the human side because no one responds to tickets/emails over there. Might update if TT ever figures this out and fixes it. This is some pure dystopian nonsense.

name: The Roman Store
review: Ads were not approved and they continue to take money out of my bank account so whenever you try contacting them there is no response but rather blatant disregard for someone's hard earned money.

name: Luvee Leash
review: I have been attempting connect my TikTok shop for more than a month. The directions and guidance is contradicting. The seller module is not user friendly. I'm going to end up taking my shop elsewhere because I'm unable to upload products, get a business verification or connect the correct account. I wanted to give zero starts but I was forced to give one star against my will.

name: Herbal Hollow Co
review:
Errors on every page, even makes Shopify's admin webpage crash. No way to edit and sync any listings.

(Update) Talked with a TikTok help rep and they confirmed it's an internal issue. They explained that they would send the problem to another team and get back to me, giving me a ticket number. Then received an email from a random gmail account asking me what the problem is. Explained it again with screenshots. Then this person asked me to pay them to have the problem fixed. So not only did my problem go ignored, my email was also shared to scammers.

name: ShootingTargets7
review:
Nothing but problems with continual app errors since I've installed. I've opened several tickets, none have helped so far.

I just submitted another because my products have disappeared from the app with multiple new errors displayed.

I'd love to sell on TikTok but at this rate I'm doubtful that will happen with this app.

name: Birkis
review: jai cree mon pixel mais je le trouve pas, nul je recommande pas du tout

name: CritchCorp Retail & Wholesale
review: Installed this app as was invited to open a TikTok Shop. I was excited to try and went through the setup. Got stuck at "Locations" I have 2 locations that are not standard locations, one is an email address and the other is another app. The TikTok app will not let me complete the setup, as these two locations do not have the "State" field completed. They don't have address fields that can be filled in. Submitted a ticket to TikTok, to find out it was the wrong department. Submitted a ticket to the other department, to find out I need to submit a ticket to the other department that I tried first. The "Integrations and App Department" told me it was a Shopify issue, not theirs. Went to the App to try to get support, guess what, it takes me back to the TikTok Integrations Department support, who will not fix their app. They wrote the app, not Shopify, so they need to fix it. Can't get my products in to TikTok to even try that out. Still, apparently I can take out their extremely expensive ads if I want, that apparently is working (from the same app). For $30 per day, I can advertise on there. Not sure where it will send them to as the TikTok shop is not working. I am sure it probably works for some, just don't get an issue and need to speak to the support, because no one wants to help. I will not be using them if their support is like that. Furthermore, I have no faith or trust in them. Sad really as I was looking forward to using the shop. I notice they don't bother with replying to feedback either, so they are probably not trying to improve anything.

name: Novara London
review: worst app ever don't use it!!!!!!!

name: RamenHeaven
review: Issues with Trackind Code Sync and Sync from Orders.. my Tickets are since 5 Days open and no solution.

name: City Crawl Adventures
review: While it's easy to install, the product syncing doesn't work at all. Shopify and TikTok are pointing fingers are each other, meanwhile no one can fix the issue. Very frustrating.

name: NEFERZIZI
review: I would like to give your poor instruction A VERY BIG ZERO. Verifying My ID took days to be completed. it gave me anxiety and I was very stressed out. It has nothing to do with my intelligence as much as it has everything to do with your POOR INSTRUCTIONS. You should be clear about verification should happen with both a mobile and laptop, not one or another. Please try to give CLEAR INSTRUCTIONS, PREFERABLY STEP BY STEP INSTUCTIONS to avoid anxiety which is unnecessary. Thank you.

name: L & M Kee, LLC
review: Be very careful of violating any Tiktok policies. They will shut your shop and withhold all the funds that they owe you regardless of whether you are in the right. Their Appeals process is unfair.

name: 38-3D
review:
I've sold on a number of platforms and while they all have their quirks and annoyances, it usually takes me a good few years to hate the platform and a fair while longer to consider removing it entirely from our sales funnel.

I installed Tiktok as a sales channel but a few days ago i already HATE this platform with a passion, there are so may things wrong with it, from not accepting tracking numbers, to the app completely not working, I've already removed over half our stock from this app despite only adding it a few days ago. i have little doubt the other half will follow and so too this app in a day or two.

Awful App, Rubbish Service, Waste of time, money and effort save yourself dont install this app

name: Mettalusso
review: sync does nork. most of the products are not approved to sell in the Shop because of reasons that do not apply. for instance states a product does not have country of origin listed in Shopify- but it definitely does. Each product disapproved has its own incorrect issues and in total there are a multitude of incorrect reasons for disapprovals AND CANNOT EDIT ISSUES IN THR SHOPIFY APP. there is not a clear path to fix items that do not sync in the TikTok Shop either. Of course, if I wanted to place a ADVERTISING though, in Marketplace all products are perfectly in sync, approved and there are not issues. Have spent way too much time on this already.

name: FreeShippingAllOrders.com
review: Just awful. Sync does not work. Seller support is non-existent, just bots that ask for screenshots and error messages even when they are not relevant.

name: NIKITA
review: Horrendous. Nothing works. Nothing syncs. No support. So buggy and convoluted. Really disappointed and frustrated.

name: Skin Body Health
review: Absolute crap. The biggest waste of time when trying to upload products to the store. I am not about to retype all my product information all over again.

name: Yūjin
review: I have tried to run Tik Tok Shop and there was a bug related to warehouse location, requesting us to change addresses, I have done it and in the middle our account was disabled because of "suspicious activities", we are running business on several other marketplaces without any problem. We have provided the information that was requested by email, and our appeal was denied, we have 15 days to provide more information, we have provided exactly what Tik Tok requested. Can someone assist us?

name: Retail Perfect
review: Same problem with TikTok it never approves your shop, all my documents are valid but it is the same thing over and over. Only app that we have this problem with.

name: Xenotees
review: If I could give this less than one star, I would. Totally useless and does not do what it says it will without jumping through invisible hoops. What a disappointment. Don't waste your time with this app.

name: My Deal Searcher
review: Products have been pending for ages, no ability to create a camping outside my region but if I sell products outside my region??? Non-friendly app...

name: Cultured Cloths Apparel & Accessories
review: Doesn't sync correctly - heavy discounts - set up buyer shipping cost - they give free shipping regardless of your settings. Lost more money than it's worth. Just sold an item listed for$9.99 plus $5 shipping - Tiktok sold for $5.99 and free shipping!!!! wtf are you kidding me - no thanks

name: Lizard Tail Belts
review: Bugs in the set up process has made the TikTok shop completely unusable for my store. TikTok help center, support, and support tickets have not been helpful or responsive.

name: Advancing Aiden
review: this is only for marketing and won't let me add my tiktok shop so I can't manage my orders in one place.

name: Posh Pet Glamour Boutique
review: I would give 0 stars if I could. It caused a tik tok javascript pixel sandbox error on my site that I cannot for the life of me get rid of. Tik tok is ABSOLUTELY NO HELP. They dont care at all. I have contacted every department possible and NO ONE will help. Terrible customer service- Do yourself a favor and avoid this app - worst mistake I ever made

name: Waterfront News
review:
Appalling. Am being charged for ads that aren't running and when I try to access support - have tried repeatedly - I'm told I don't have access and need to verify my account.

My account was already verified, which is how I was able to pay TikTok money.

Continue to be locked out of account, and when I email the address below, I'm told to raise a ticket with support - WHICH I CAN'T AS I'M LOCKED OUT!!!

Can someone PLEASE get in touch and assist me.

name: Amour Propre®
review: I'm constantly being charged for advertising on not doing. There's No customer service.

name: Allmartdeal
review: worst sales channel i ever tried so far. useless and please be careful sharing your data with them. they will drive your store to hell. scripts will make your site super slow. try elsewhere for better service

name: Essential Diamonds Co
review: It's extremely frustrating to have your products disapproved for information that's clearly inputted within the shopify platform. Reaching out to customer service is a joke. I reached out for assisted over a month ago and they seemed to just pass me off from one person to another - neither of which solved or even addressed my issues. I was very hopeful for this integration but nope.

name: Kafetos
review: very hard to synchronize the inventory. We had tried many times with different options and no luck.

name: Glowy Zoey
review: I've got the same issue that so many do. TikTok store suspended with no reason given and no reply to support ticket. Been in business 8 years and are verified on Facebook and instagram with no issues. TikTok has been a huge pain to deal with. I also didn't get ad credits promised long ago. I wouldn't bother until they get their act together.

name: Marie Sharp's Company Store
review:
Dec 2023 UPDATE: Our account is now PERMAMENTLY DISABLED - due to lack of activity!!!

What a joke it is to try to advertise legitimate products on this platform!

October 2023 - Incredibly difficult and frustrating app. Very difficult to setup, practically impossible to get support, when you go to create a ticket, you are told you don't have access to your own account to create the ticket?

We wasted $500 to get an ad credit and got ZERO conversions. I would not waste your time on this app or on TikTok advertising.

name: Sock Panda
review: ** Updated*** Made another attempt over a year later - still a terrible experience. . Got my money back, but this is just a bad company (original) I was hesitant to do this and I should have gone with my instincts. I created an account linked to my store and put money on my account. Shortly after the store was suspended (Sock Panda) and no reason has been given, They keep saying they will keep the money too. We will see about that! However - beware of disgusting behavior by sleezy interests. Made another attempt over a year later - still a terrible experience. . Got my money back, but this is just a bad company

name: CALI Strong
review: I am a little puzzled by the reviews here. My experience has been a nightmare. For two weeks I have been trying to get my store verified. No response from TikTok Seller Help Center in 16 days. Only automated cut-and-paste responses from their Feedback Form which don't address the issue. I can't get a useful human response no matter how I try. TikTok sounds great from all the reviews, but I can't get support at all to get it started.

name: I'll Use That
review: Horrible experience. Connecting products and having them link to TikTok shop is such a pain. You have to re categorize every products, they don't accept certain shipment providers. It is just a mess. Not worth it to sell through there or advertise my products. Very disappointed. Discontinues my products even though they are listed in the category they suggest.

name: apop // apoptosisnyc.com
review: zero help, doesnt work

name: Sugoi JDM
review: TikTok attempts to persuade you to enroll in their marketing sales campaigns by guaranteeing you coupons and free shipping that you can use and will be credited for. However, this is a false claim. They do not provide any reimbursement for these offers, and they also keep your funds for a period of 2-3 weeks. Not even worth the time and headache to sell on TikTok.

name: Plum Deluxe Tea
review: Watch for Data Loss in New Version!! We have been using this app for the ads pixel integration, but upgraded to use the new Tiktok shops functionality after being prompted by Tiktok. We were using Silk before for Tiktok shops, and I encourage you to continue to use Silk. This integration will wipe your Tiktok shop of all listings and then most listings will have some sort of error, but none of the links work for you to fix it. We've had a ticket open with Tiktok for about a week and nobody seems to have any idea how to fix it, meanwhile our Tiktok shop has been decimated.

name: My Store
review: The day after I deposited a bunch of money to start running Tik Tok Ads on my Shop, I suddenly get an email saying I have received a ticket with 6 violations for using "other creator's content on TikTok Shop". -- WHICH I ABSOLUTELY DID NOT. And when I clicked on the link the ticket says it's unappealable. It made me so mad that I spent the last 2 weeks creating my own designs, had already posted several videos and finally decided to put $$ into ads and THEN receive this nonsense, and it has the nerve to be unappealable!!!! Pissed me off so much that I immediately deleted my shop and am now trying to get my money back that has not yet been spent on ads! And it's a lot since it had only been a day and a half.

name: Kasa Karly
review: honestly the setup of this is so frustrating. The synching makes no sense. products show pending in Shopify and on tiktok show approved. the two dont work well together. im a very tech savvy person. I have now had to hire someone and even they're confused...

name: Garden Bunker
review: Doesn't connect to TikTok Shop

name: Gryphon Worx Creations
review: This app worked fine for the most part last year. Now since the update at the end of the year (2023) it is completely broken. The sync is broken. This app is now worthless and causing more stress than it is worth.

name: Greenphones
review: If I could rate this with minus stars I would have. I have implemented hundreds of apps/APIs etc. But this integration between Shopify and Tiktok is the worst I have ever experienced. All went relatively smooth until trying to set up a product catalog. In which I constantly got an error message regarding the country or region cant be selected for my storefront. Firstly I consulted Shopify support to which they said I didnt have any issues with the the setup of my storefront. I spent hours with their support team with no solution. At the same time I reached out to Tiktok support. Seriously slow responses and no idea on how to resolve the issue. Surely if Shopify and Tiktok work together on an integration, then somebody must be able to pin point what the issue is. I then set up a completely new Business account with Tiktok and again tried to connect to the Tiktok account from Shopify and got the same error. I have sent out one final email to Tiktok support, but frankly it shouldnt be this difficult and for two major companies like Tiktok and Shopify, the level of support as been way below average.

name: Lovely Body
review: I can’t connect the TikTok shop

name: GodefroyBeauty
review:
A vast majority of their 5 star reviews are AI generated. Just read them and you'll see. I don't understand how Shopify allows all these fake reviews on their platform.

App is very limited in what you can do. Does not sync product orders between TikTok Shop and Shopify. Pretty much a pointless app.

name: Little Zen One
review: Awful. The app doesn't work. I set up a campaign via the Shopify admin. The campaign "failed" so I "cancelled" the campaign after it failed; however, Tik Tok has continued to bill me (3 x the amount that is stated in the campaign total via the app dahsboard found in the Shopify admin.) I have reached out to Tik Tok (through the app, through the business admin site, and through the Shopify app channel multiple times... with no response.) I then reached out to Shopify, who said they can't help because it's a "third party" site. In my experience, the app is untrustworthy: 1. it doesn't work 2. there is no support from Tik Tok 3. there is no support from Shopify

name: SnowPaw Store
review: Only any good if you only have 1 location setup on Shopify, as we have multiple locations it is unusable as there is no way to select the location so it just fails to connect as it has just randomly selected our Amazon Location which is located at a different address to the address setup in TikTok

name: DORBEL store
review: JE me suits nouveau Dan's bizness

name: Pack Turtle
review: It is worthless and so is their nonexistent support. I can't run ad campaigns or upload videos to our business account. I have been trying to get help for weeks and have been completely ignored. This horrible excuse for a company should be banned. We will be filing a complaint through Shopify and the FTC.

name: Flint Clothing
review:
Integration was a constant pain. When we imported our products 80% failed verification with no explanation and would not verify after multiple amendments. Raised a support ticket for help, got nowhere and they market the ticket as resolved despite not addressing the issue.

The core issue appears to be over the name of our products, which are factually accurate and design-inspired names, yet they appear to breach some standards. There appears to be no way to have a human review the products to see that they meet the guidelines and I don't expect they will amend the algorithm any time soon.

Awful experience thus far.

name: DAVERRI FASHIONS
review: Installed the app. and I continue to get error codes. I'm unable to see disapproved products, and there's no explanation on what's needed to fix the disapproved products. It's nearly impossible to reach support. I've sent multiple messages and no response. You're left hanging trying to figure things app. Not happy at all.

name: TFashion Mart
review: We receive several hundreds of orders on TikTok Shop daily. Unfortunately, TikTok Shop app doesn't do a very good job at sync'ing orders, especially after the orders are shipped on Shopify. Tracking number does not get sync'ed to the orders on TikTok Shop as it should on many orders so I have to manually add tracking numbers to each orders for hundreds of orders. Of course, their support staff doesn't even understand what the issue is and just asks to provide Order ID, Order Status, Shipping Provider, Tracking Number, etc. for all hundreds of orders. Are you serious? To provide all these information for hundreds of orders will take hours and days.

name: Turbo Java Coffee Co.
review: I've been trying to sync my Shopify store to TikTok for over 5 months now. TikTok Support leaves a lot to be desired, and they don't seem to care if the issue gets resolved or not. They don't reply to tickets and just close them out instead of fixing the issues.

name: Earrings by Emma
review: It's been a very frustrating experience using this app. It does not sync well and is pretty buggy. :(

name: Trend4us
review: This App i great some how! but useless you can't target the market you want, not recommended for long term at all.. There is no flexibility nor options to create and target your Audience in specific market.

name: Alididihair
review: terrible ,can't get connect with ads account and customer service only reply during 48h

name: Simply Spun
review: Shopify is great, very intuitive and relatively easy to navigate and connecting it to a TikTok shop is relatively easy. TikTok Shop is very frustrating at times. The process of accepting orders and printing shipping labels is straight foreword but TikTok as a platform seems to hold more bearing in their buyers than their sellers. Buyer initiated refunds and returns are accepted and processed automatically with what feels like little regard from the Seller. Customer Service leaves much to desire. Any explanation of violations you might encounter and why they were applied are non-existent and it seems appeals of violations fall on deaf ears. Its unfortunate that is it such an effective way to get your products in front of possible consumers, as long as you color within the vague lines TikTok has set. Good Luck.

name: J and J Gaming Factory
review:
1 star.

would be 0 stars if i could. avoid tiktok shop, their customer support is terrible. syncing products fails because tiktok doesn't support the same categories that shopify does.

random products fall into prohibited or restricted. and the appeal process doens't work.

save yourself the time and avoid using tiktok.

name: Pure Choice Farms
review: Easily the worst platform we try to run ads on. Use TikTok as a last resort.

name: KRE Prime
review: I'm extremely disappointed in the TikTok Shop app. I was excited when the app first came out. it's seem to be working for the first month or so, it's was great but it worked. Now, I'm uninstalling the app because it's not working and I can't get any support. I can't sync my products, inventories from Shopify to TikTok shop and I can't sync my order from TikTok shop to Shopify. It's has been a nightmare, so I will be going back to the previously app I was using. I have submitted over 10 support tickets and receive zero support. They closed the tickets and gave me the running around respond, like AI. Having zero customer support for an unstable app is the worst.

name: Under NY Sky
review: Registration takes too long and has bugs at every step. Moreover, customer support is not responsive. I'm talking about 30 days waiting without answer or progress.

name: OsoPorto
review: Unfortunately, have not been able to make the TikTok sales channel work because "a country or region cannot be selected for your storefront," yet the storefront us correctly set up. TikTok said it is a Shopify issue. Shopify said its a TikTok issue. Then TikTok just stopped responding, and eventually I gave up.

name: LSM Boutique's Fashion N Fragrances
review: Very difficult to use, I tried and it didn't work out for me when I went to tiktok to post, it was difficult

name: Nation Athletics Bjj
review: Would love to start advertising and selling on TikTok if the set up actually worked. Can't find any support online and all the 'academy' articles don't seem to make sense for the options available. Been down a spiralling rabbit whole of youtube 'how too'. Seems overly complicated just connect a product feed from shopify.

name: Skill Bully
review: you would think today it would be plug in play... talk about the many loops you have to jump just to set up a shop that will take a few days just to see if your product will load.. this should be an easy sync but they would rather you pay developers to do something that should be done with ease... such a joke

name: clock.wathches.gr
review: why my account is frozen ?? please re-open my account ! why my account is frozen ?? please re-open my account ! why my account is frozen ?? please re-open my account !

name: Bibimbo
review: Can't figure out how to verify mi business informations. I sent them 3 official certificate in order to validate my account, but nothing seems to work. I AM UNABLE (like many others people) TO VERIFY MY BUSINESS ACCOUNT. After 6 days and something like 10 attempts, I gave up.. ONE STAR, fucking TIKTOK

name: Clothing by CAETHELS
review: I have been suspended on both of my store. I cannot find a reason and I i'm limited to resource. to fix the issue.the situation been, very crazy and difficult

name: SAVE ME FROM
review: SMALL BUSINESS - BEWARE! Uninstalling, and highly disappointed as they fraudulently lie about their ad credit for small businesses. We initially downloaded the app as we were emailed about a Small Business Credit for advertising, which took forever to verify our business account as they were not disclosing what documents they needed from us, so we ended up uploading all of our business documents and finally got approved. After doing so, we were emailed to claim our credit which we did, and took us to the Advertising Manager and we assumed that we would be able to use this credit on our ads but was not applied to our account and were charged for the ads we were supposed to get credit for. Upon following up with TikTok Business support, they were stating we needed to claim the credit by 12/15 (not disclosed in the email anywhere, and we did claim it on 12/10), and then closed our ticket with no attempt at resolving. I filed another claim, asking where in the email is this information to be then told that the ad credit is no longer available in my country (US), yet we received an email 01/05 stating that there is another small business ad credit we can apply on the account, which does not disclose an expiration. There is no resolution on their part, they are not looking to help small businesses during these difficult times due to their fraudulent "ad credit"

name: JaeBee
review: I installed this app months ago and still can't get any help with setup. I also was suspended after setting up an ad account.

name: Angelique Lafreniere Artist
review: Okay my products have been in the pending option for more then 2 weeks ahhhh

name: Snoot Boopers
review: No matter what I do, the app will not connect to my TikTok account. Requested help from Support, no response.

name: Lovers Rock Sea Moss
review: Error message when trying to connect my tiktok shop to my shopify store. Continue to get the same error message "Oops, please reload page" with no other explaination. Tried 3 different browsers and got the same error message. App is a waste of time.

name: M1インソール公式サイト
review: Compared to facebook ads, the targeting was poor and the CPA was about 8 times higher. Also, I attended a seminar on TikTok and started advertising 8 days later because of the campaign. However, the campaign was not applied, so I inquired about it and the answer was that the campaign ended the day before I started the ad. Since there is no deadline on the materials, it is almost a scam.

name: AMAFHHA-SHOP
review: I have been struggling to setup my Tik Tok shop but after providing all my Business info and when I submitted my form getting message info incorrect while all info are correct and checked my details multiple times are correct, I then contact support team and they are asking for screen shop to resolve the issue and without screen shop they can not help, I am not able to provide as there is no options available and my issue was not solved, company policy is very bad as agent told me this is a company policy to get screen shop

name: bindrz
review:
I really wanted the app to work since I have been using a 3rd party app to sync and wanted to move away from those costs. But there are two major issues that is a deal breaker so far: 1) the inability to selectively disable or enable the sync of certain attributes (like product name, description, photos, pricing) and 2) if you disable the TikTok channel in Shopify for a product, it will delete the product in TikTok and when you re-enable it, it will create the product with a NEW ID. This means any commission set or reviews are not available when it created the new product.

I'll have to wait until they come out with more granular features before I can comfortably switch to it.

name: Jewelry Sessions
review: My account was deactivated by tik tok for policy violations which is ludicrous seeing I have contacted shopify and Tik more than once about getting help to connect my account. My shopify account is not even connected and they deactivated my account for a potentially risky seller. It's interesting since I wasn't even able to load 1 product. Wow pretty discussting Tik Tok has never once sent me any message from customer support in helping with this and it has been at least 3 weeks since I started this time-consuming trip.

name: Lost Tag
review:
I don't even know where to begin with the number of issues trying to connect my shopify store to tiktok.

This app is wonderful if you want to spend several weeks trying to get integrated only to come out of it with a permanent & automatic TikTok Shop closure due to "Shop Compliance Incorrect Registration Information - Shop Closure". Attaching your EIN paperwork from the IRS apparently is not enough and they offer no proactive support when this will happen to you.

I get that it must be this way due to them trying to avoid fraud cases maybe? but it is a rather complicated set up and I am sure I am not the only store that is simply missing some setting somewhere that would be an easy thing to fix with a little assistance.

I am sure I could fix this shop violation easily as I am in fact a valid business with the proper paperwork and not a fraudster, but honestly this onboarding experience has taught me that this is not a selling partnership I want to pursue and I will stick to just marketing on TikTok which is an actual good experience. I think its just the shop experience itself to be honest and I also can only imagine the type of issues they had early on where these types of hurdles needed to be put in place.

name: Pure Product Australia
review: Stay away from Tiktok for business, connecting to nowhere, you can't find the comparing you created and the they system dose not allow you to open tickets no phone support

name: Wild Daisy Acres
review: It don't like my products

name: Pleea Cosmetics®
review: Objetivamente la aplicación es muy mala para un país como Colombia, no ves resultados, cuesta mucho el día y nunca sabes si la gente vio la campaña o no, no la recomiendo, no pierdan el dinero por lo menos en Colombia.

name: Handmade’s Victim
review: Muy descontenta con esta aplicación, hice una campaña con un presupuesto de 30 € y me han cobrado lo que les parece, me siguen cobrando todos los días una cuota y he tenido hasta que cancelar la tarjeta porque no hay manera de ponerse en contacto con ellos. Si hay alguien de esta aplicación que me pueda ayudar, ayudar, lo agradecería

name: True Victory
review: Not able to log on. Once I arrive at the section for entering my business account info the app crashes.

name: Reboot Horizon
review: cela fait plusieurs heures (6h00 au moins) que j'essaie en vain de connecter shopify et tik tok, au secours, je n'y arrive pas...

name: Skyrocket Coffee
review: Cannot link to my tiktok account. TikTok portion says it cannot find my account. Support link does not work.

name: Yarnspirations
review: Unbelievably bad. Product sales channels are ignored; it takes hours to map products to categories because they must be done individually. Just an absolutely poor app that isn't worth the time or the effort of setting up.

name: KISPER
review: The app is broken and there's no real-time support available. It didn't let me connect my business TikTok account to Shopify.

name: Sheair Butters
review: How does this useless app have 4.8 stars? This app serves no purpose at all. You can set up ads on TikTok without this app. You cannot even sync your Shopify catalog to TikTok. Complete garbage. I have wasted days for nothing. TikTok and Shopify both should be disgusted at misleading customers.

name: Roadrunner Trail Jewelry
review: Refused to recognize my account with my phone number. Every time it sent me a code, I put it in and then I got an error, unrecognizable account! Super frustrating, especially since I have already synced my account to shopify and am able to log into my account.

name: Nettle Studios
review: almost impossible to set up or get support... our business details keep getting denied for no reason. disappointing... let small businesses sell on TikTok!!

name: Clear Wellness 360
review:
Nightmare trying to get TikTok Shop running. What seemed like a quick, simple installation has ground to halt, stuck in the mode "We're Getting Everything Ready" when trying to sync my products from Shopify.

Numerous support tickets with screenshots, a loom video and full explanations have just had the issue pushed around from person to person. Now I am told it is with the "internal team" and who knows when I will hear back on that.

I really wanted to give this a go. Seemed like a no-brainer to try this, put up shop Shop Ads and see if we can get some traction. But, it has taken SO much time I that can ill afford. I am giving up.

name: StreamZ (UK)
review: Shocking introduction to TikTok with this App. Decided to go ahead and setup the App following the offer of $200 credit. 1/ We haven't received any credit and 'support' seem like they've followed the FB support training manual and just repeat the same/wrong thing over and over again. 2/ Of just 3 products setup one is showing in the App as "rejected" for TikTok marketing with no reason whatsoever, yet an advert we setup is running. ZERO support and ZERO help so cant see us using this app or TikTok much longer.

name: Role-Players
review: Keep asking for ein verification I have done it 7 times info is correct ,and no telephone number to call and see what problem is and get fixed. Still not registered geuss 3 bank account 147c and drivers license renewal not enough

name: metalcraftusa
review: Difficult to sign up with TikTok Shop as a business as one requirement is a passport. The Chat with us feature is worthless as one just gets the run around and no solid answers. Started a ticket but then email received saying they did not understand what I needed and yet I was very clear with photo and description so just a waste of time trying to get this to work. Also saw limit of $40 shipping cost I could charge and I want to know what shipping company would ship a 49 lb. box 19"w x 19L x 13"h, $800 value, Adult Signature required at time of delivery for $40 from MN to LA If there is a shipping company who could do it for that, please let me know as our discounted rate was much more than that.

name: Atelier Extensions
review: Sync of products doesn't work.

name: Peachi Baby
review: Really buggy. I signed up for £36 of ads credit off the bat and then had huge issues setting my pixel & account up to actually be able to spend the credit. Support forms don't work on web or mobile. The link to customer support on the invoice doesn't work. I had to disconnect my account and create a new one. I then submitted a brand new ticket, clicked send and everything I'd written disappeared. Fed up of going round in circles and hoping one of my messages has got through as I'd like a refund on the original account. I was excited about using the Tiktok channel and was hoping to take advantage of the welcome offer but I'm now dubious about using this it at all because the support is so bad/buggy.

name: Motomike Canada
review: I cannot even add payment info, drop down menu does not contain my city. Pretty useless to have a drop down menu for payment addresses, especially if it contains only like 30 cities for all of the province. garbage.

name: Dana Cooper Bermuda
review: Really really bad, took too long, no help, repeat typing over and over again and doing again here. No help, bad for a small business....too much work and waste of tie for what it is worth sadly

name: Airzey
review: Why does it ask for SSN or ITIN to set up tiktok shop? Literally wouldn't give that away to anyone and no other social platform asks for it.

name: Rizz Wear
review: uselessly difficult to open up a shop

name: TWRAPS
review: not syncing orders tracking # after I ship via Shopify

name: Workshop Companion
review: Tiktok does not allow digital sales.

name: Flavor Your Meat
review: Horrible. Trying to set up a sales channel is a nightmare. Spent days trying to get it figured out only to be told the products I am selling I have to be invited to sell. Huge waste of my time.

name: Booster
review: Not compatible with store in Romania

name: RENWILLS
review: Worthless, overpriced and in my opinion misleading. First there was a $100 ad credit that disappeared after I installed the app. Set up an ad anyway and emailed TikTok about the credit. Charged me $5 add free then rejected my ad after running for about 12 hours after charging me another $7.30. The rejection tells me to go to the ad manager to learn why my add was rejected but cannot find the ad manager to save my life. Back to Google and Facebook ads where my $20 can make a few hundred in 12 hours where TikTok was $0.

name: bambu
review: This has been a useful exercise. I cannot even load this. Platform does not exist. I've tried multiple browsers, system errors, nobody to contact at customer support. Seems dodgy. No contact, no email address, and no reply to make things better.

name: SOCCER BOOKS
review:
We attempted to create an advertising account but encountered significant difficulties with the verification process. Despite submitting 12 different photo ID verification attempts, we were unable to successfully complete the verification requirements. Your overly complex ID verification system is likely deterring thousands of potential customers from using your platform. This restrictive approach to verification is unnecessarily limiting your business growth. Unfortunately, due to these technical barriers, we will not be proceeding further.

Best regards, The Soccerbooks Team

name: Favors Decor and More
review: App is worthless. Nothing sinks properly This is only created for them to get ad money from you not to list products for sale.

name: Sinking Birdies
review:
Once a product is linked you cannot unlink it.

Rubbish

name: inselife
review: 1, i want to set up tik tok shopping partner integration,but can not get through the data sharing step,we choose the maximum level,and connect the tik tok pixel for shopify,then click the confirm button,but it shows error:request failed with status code 504; 2,i can not disconnect my current pixels; 3,i even can not disconnect my current tik tok for business account; that's really annoying no one help

name: GMI - Guitar and Music Institute Online Shop
review: Think before you install this app if you are a business but not yet registered for VAT. The app demands that you have a VAT registration number (I'm in the UK). If you don't have one, you're in a loop. Why not try the HELP section. Nope, they get back to you fairly quickly, but robotically just say "all EU and UK businesses must add their VAT number"....DESPITE telling them that my business did not have one and it is non compulsory for UK businesses under £86K turnover or there about...the help was utterly useless and to be frank, not fit for purpose. Now the app is in Limbo...meaning it's not totally installed due to no VAT number but I can't actually delete it from my Shopify store without going into the code...brilliant, just what I needed. Now I can waste more of my time delving into the guts of the Shopify code. I've always thought Tik Tok was probably nonsense, my experience with the company confirms that they are just that ...nonsense.

name: anying360
review: It seems tiktok pixel is slowing down my web site. How can I solve this problem? Why should I spend money on a TikTok campaign when my website is too slow 'cose tiktok pixel?

name: Hairstylistsusy
review: E intentado por un med sincronizar tik tok con shopify me da un error el cual me comunico con tik tok dicen que todo esta bien, me comunico con shopify y dicen lo mismo. Super mal

name: EasyCheese.no
review: Adds close to a second of extra load time on our sites and on top of that the product catalog is not supported when the store use Norwegian as standard language. Support couldn't care less. This app needs some proper work.

name: Star Shopping-de
review: Can't get through to customer service! very inconvenient! customer service should be super active,with a chat always available 24 hours a day.

name: ladymascherianaturalbeauty
review: . I have wrriten TT about what is going on with my account. These people do not reply back until someone write a review. I need help putting my stuff on TT, The ads runs great. But to open my store on TT is a dead deal because no one will reach out to you. I can not find my id , Its really hard.

name: Carauana Store
review: La Configurazione Con Shopify è Facile Devo Provare a vedere Come Viene il Mio Shop e Soprattutto il Traffico Ricevuto Per Ora Vale 5 Stars Aggiornamento Perdita di tempo, dopo una settimana di lavoro non riesco a decidere il mercato dove voglio io , per vender in America deve per forza trasferirsi li. impossibile mi sento preso per il cu llooo . ho 4 paese da scegliere per il mercato in base alla posizione dove sono connesso!!!!! Ma io sono in vacanza in Africa ... insomma disinstallo subito Prima di diventare matto Non vale una Stella La stella per il supporto che non hanno cercato di risolvere il problema

name: Grandiose Gallery
review: Very cumbersome to set up account.

name: Instant Joy
review: L'application déconnecte le pixel sans raison en pleine campagne, ce qui nous oblige a en re créer un nouveau et à perdre toute la data sur le produit. A fuir

name: Stefany Bags Shoes and More
review: selling vintage items especially old luxury bags in TikTok Shop simply impossible, they over regulated this by requiring so many things that its not worth it

name: colombiancoffeeus
review: Utter GARBAGE you would think these guys know what they are doing. the apps lags horribly their compliance / legal parameters have no concept of what the real world looks like The target audience buys Garbage. the demographics on this app are not worth the investment and finally their support is a joke. not worth your effort. the return rates are horrendous

name: Tachinedas Kreativshop
review: Ticket ID 796388: Waiting for promised 200€ ad credit for three weeks. No support, only telling us to wait.

name: Papas Brittle
review:
II am not sure who submitted this, but it we have been trying to get on TicTok since may, I have had heatied conversations with your personell who acknowledged the problem but kept sending me back to go.

I lost a lot of valuable time, and money trying to get approved (and I still get emails saying I am not approved) and not being able to sell. This is my prime season and I am just getting up and running.

While TikToc is a good tool, the process me was absolutely ridiculous. I am a legitimate business with my own location, not selling out of my kitchen or bedroom and I had the hardest time because I use my home - (I have a office at home) for my mailing address not my leased brick and mortar. May, June, July, August, Sept, Oct, Nov... Then we had problems connecting with Shopifly, which should have been easy. We are in, now I hope all the drama pays off!

name: Dr. Gina's Shop
review: I like engaging with my community but when they ask for my free guides - TT doesn't allow live links so I lose a lot of people bc they either have to type out the url address (yeah right) or go to my link in bio which they don't want to do either. Also, I have been trying to connect my Shopify store with TT shop for over 3 months now and they have not been able to figure it out... I'm still hopeful but my audience is not so thrilled with how long this is taking.

name: Mae's Bayou
review: At first I had trouble getting w-9 completed as I had to submit it twice. Now I'm having trouble with the app working through Shopify. The Shop Management page won't load on my office computer but everything else does. There's no true category for my hot sauce and i have to sift through the categories to find that, and the app freezes and refreshes on my tablet. I would do it on my phone but the mobile process makes it extremely tedious and hard to switch between options. All of this because it wouldn't sink without more details. Meanwhile, none of the products are currently showing in my shop. This is day 2.

name: Flatbush Granola Company
review: Seems easy at first but it quickly broke down. It was very frustrating having to update info in all the locations in my Shopify account before TikTok could assign a warehouse. Then, even though my business appears to be verified, I'm now being asked to provide trademark authorization to list my own products that are currently in my Shopify Catalog!! This is almost making me want to give up.

name: Danger Close Apparel
review: Onboarding was terrible! The product import process is too bulking and auto features are highly inaccurate. The worst thing about this is TikTok encrypts order details in Shopify, so you can't use Shopify or other third part apps to ship items... I understand protecting customer data, but many seek a solution so businesses don't need multiple ways to get orders out the door. Other than that, the app is stable and works as intended.

name: Social Riiz
review: Product syncing needs work. My items never match my inventory. I end up having tiktok shop products that should be marked out of stock get ordered and im forced to cancel orders. Inventory management and syncing can be more streamlined.

name: Ralph's Orchard
review:
Integration only works for ads, which I wish I knew before spending hours trying to figure out why my products were not showing on TikTok Shop. Update from TikTok was:

"Our eCommerce solutions are undergoing a complete overhaul and eligibility and availability have been restricted due to this. This temporary pause means you will be unable to showcase your products directly from your Shopify store through your TikTok profile.

It will not be possible to activate your TikTok Shopping feature at this time, however, we do hope to have a solution to this soon and will be rolling out our new and improved Shopify integration to all our clients.

You can still use your catalog to create Video Shopping Ads which will present your products in a storefront-like experience, but this will require a paid campaign to be launched and will still link back to your website for purchasing rather than the transaction being conducted on TikTok."

name: Sculpd
review:
There are some BIG limitations of this app.

Firstly (and most importantly), you can only link one Shopify Shop to an Ad Account - which causes big headaches if you've got multiple stores (for example, one per country). By contrast, Meta lets you connect multiple Stores to a catalogue and select which markets they are for; which is a far superior solution than having to make lots of catalogues and ad accounts.

Secondly, there is no longer any support for TikTok Shop (i.e. users being able to buy directly inside the TikTok app). This integration was the only way that TTS made sense as a proposition, otherwise it's an incredibly manual and slow process and as a result it's not worth enabling. Again, this is a feature that Meta's Shopify app offers.

Lastly, TikTok doesn't support Supplementary Feeds - so if you wanted to add any additional information (custom labels, alt images etc) then it all has to be directly added to your Shopify - as you won't be able to add any further info within TikTok. This is a feature that, once again, Meta (and Google) offer in their integrations.

Hopefully they address these issues in the future, but in the meantime the app needs a lot of work to bring it into parity with their competitors.

name: Que Shebley
review: way too many technical issues, up to date it still will not connect to our tiktok shop no matter how many times we try, it just loads the tiktok shop page and nothing else happens and in the app is continues to say setup in progress. consistent lack of customer service. very disappointing

name: Cardboard Clubhouse
review: Some products merged seamlessly, others will not merge into tiktok shop no matter what I try. still a little buggy.

name: MIRPANDA WORKS
review: I am a Shopify seller who wishes to promote her art through Tiktok ONLY. I do not want to sell directly through the app. This is because I have noticed since connecting my Shopfiy to Tiktok, Tiktok has put discounts on my products that I do not offer or want to offer ever for my art. My art comes as it does when I put the price for it. Please help me understand more about Tiktok Shop services for my products and how to gain more control of my products being broadcast on this app. I feel lost and a little overwhelmed by this Tiktok shop feature and need guidance or I will disconnect it accordingly to avoid conflict with my products being mis-sold and discounted to where I may lose profit. Thank you.

name: Simply Organic Soaps
review: I love the idea of selling on TikTok. Unfortunately I had a terrible experience with this platform. I was using TikTok shipping which was the recommended method through TikTok. After finding out that all of my sales was shipping free through the TikTok method I created a template for shipping. Even after creating the template for shipping with flat rates, customers were still getting free shipping. There is no way to adjust pricing through the Shopify Platform to counter balance cost so basically all the sales I made, I actually had to owe money due to the free shipping on already discounted organic soaps and candles. I can't use this platform anymore until they fixed these issues.

name: Supplement Mart

name: Naturally Wicked
review: Totally confused to be honest. Seems overly complex, much as Facebook ads did in the early days. We're one company, with one brand, and yet I can't keep count of how many accounts are required to send products to a single TikTok shop & single Tiktok account. We now have an account for Tiktok, another for Tiktok Shop, another for Tiktok business, and now a new one for Tiktok ads? Bewildered. And I've lost all interest. I'll look again in a few years when the Tiktok has streamlined its system and decided what it's doing.
